enb_long_title: Seventh Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) Eighth Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
sentences: The non-group on institutions and mechanisms discussed the final articles of the draft negotiating text, including those on ratification, regional economic integration organizations, entry into force and withdrawal.

A number of substantive discussions were postponed until decisions determining the overall shape of the protocol or other legal instrument have been taken, and the group agreed to reconvene for an evening session.

On provisions for regional economic integration organizations, most participants felt that the issue should be deferred as it is linked to the AGBM`s acceptance of the 'bubble' concept for meeting commitments.

Negotiators concluded that a decision on whether to link entry into force to the number of ratifications alone or to a combination of ratifications and carbon dioxide emissions covered should also be postponed.
One group supported entry into force after fifty ratifications.
